Welcome to my personal blog. Here I share notes, tutorials, and workshop materials focused on programming in R, data wrangling, and spatial data analysis. Most of the content is in Spanish. Enjoy exploring!

<strong style="color:black;font-size:18px;">1. Data Structures in R</strong> (in Spanish) — <a href="https://lectures-r.gitlab.io/blog/3-objects">click here</a>

- Data types
- Vectors, lists, matrices, and data frames.

<strong style="color:black;font-size:18px;">2. Tidy Data in R</strong> (in Spanish) — <a href="https://blog-r.gitlab.io/5-tidy-data">click here</a>

- Reading and writing data
- Adding and removing variables
- Merging datasets

<strong style="color:black;font-size:18px;">3. Introduction to Spatial Data in R</strong><br>

- [Lecture (Part 1)](https://eduard-martinez.github.io/workshop/gis_in_r/lecture/parte-1.pdf)
- [Lecture (Part 2)](https://eduard-martinez.github.io/workshop/gis_in_r/lecture/parte-2.html)
- [R code](https://eduard-martinez.github.io/workshop/gis_in_r/code/workshop-01.R)
